message: Hello! This is a rare opportunity to purchase a product that could potentially change your life. I assure you that the product I am offering is of the highest demand, and I am confident that you will be satisfied with its performance. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. Are you ready to take the leap and make a purchase?

Since there are no previous sales records, I'll rely on the given probabilities. With a 20% chance of the product being low-quality, I'm not willing to take the risk of losing $1000000. I'll pass on this one.
